A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film was very good in my opinion however I feel like it wasn't as good the force awakens. I feel like the force awakens was so incredible and enthralling it was the first Star Wars films in years and I think the last Jedi had a lot to compete with with the force awakens. I felt the film dragged on a bit 2 hours and a half! I just left the cinema feeling a little disappointed and deflated but I really didn't want to be because it wasn't a bad film. No spoilers but I hated this forced relationship between two characters and some bits of the film I was left saying \"what was that?!\". Not my favourite Star Wars film but not the worse in my opinion.
